00131 inline bool     IsPow2( unsigned int i )        {       return ( !( ( i-1 )&i ) )&&( i!=0 );    }
00132 inline unsigned int FindPow2( unsigned int v )
00133 {
00135         if ( !v )
00136                 return 1;
00137 
00139         if ( !IsPow2( v ) )
00140         {
00141                 while ( !IsPow2( v ) )
00142                         v = v & ( v - 1 );
00143                 v <<= 1;
00144         }
00145         return v;
00146 }
00147 template < typename _T > _T Min( const _T& a, const _T& b )             {       return a < b ? a : b;           }

00150 template < typename _T > _T Max3( const _T& a, const _T& b, const _T& c )       {       return Max( a, Max( b, c ) );   }
00151 template < typename _T > _T Clamp( const _T& a, const _T& min, const _T& max )
00152 {
00153         _T t = ( a > max ? max : a );
00154         return ( t < min ? min : t );
00155 }

00180 inline unsigned int Log2( unsigned int v )
00181 {
00182         unsigned int i = 0;
00183         while ( v != 0 )
00184         {
00185                 v >>= 1;
00186                 ++i;
00187         }
00188         return ( i-1 );
00189 }
00190 inline float Log10( float v ) { return __INTERNAL_MATH_IMPL::log10f( v ); }
00191 inline float InvSqrtFast( float v )
00192 {
00194 #ifdef __GNUC__
00197         union { float f; int i; } f = { v };
00198         f.i = 0x5F3759DF - ( f.i >> 1 );
00199         return ( 3.0f - v * f.f * f.f ) * f.f * 0.5f;
00200 #else
00201         float vHalf = 0.5f*v;
00202         int i = *(int*)&v;
00203         i = 0x5F3759DF - (i>>1);        
00204         v = *(float*)&i;
00205         v = v*(1.5f-vHalf*v*v);         
00206         return v;
00207 #endif
00208 }

00225 template < typename _T > void SolveQuadratic( float& posInt, float& negInt, const _T& a, const _T& b, const _T& c )
00226 {
00228         float underSqrt = Sqrt( b*b - 4.0f * a * c );
00229         posInt = ( -b + underSqrt ) / ( 2.0f * a );
00230         negInt = ( -b - underSqrt ) / ( 2.0f * a );
00231 }

00269 template < typename _T > _T Align16( _T v )
00270 {
00272         size_t offset = ( size_t )v;
00273         offset = ( offset + 0xF ) & 0xFFFFFFF0;
00274         return ( _T )offset;
00275 }

00277 template < typename _T > _T Lerp( const _T& v0, const _T& v1, float t )
00278 {
00279         return ( _T )( ( 1.0f - t ) * v0 + t * v1 );
00280 }
00281 
00282 template < typename _T > _T Bezier3( const _T& v0, const _T& cp1, const _T& cp2, const _T& v2, float t )
00283 {
00284         float t2 = t*t;
00285         float t3 = t*t2;
00286         float oneMinusT = (1.0f-t);
00287         float oneMinusT2 = oneMinusT * oneMinusT;
00288         float oneMinusT3 = oneMinusT * oneMinusT2;
00289         return oneMinusT3*v0 + 3.0f*t*oneMinusT2*cp1 + 3.0f*t2*oneMinusT*cp2 + t3*v2;
00290 }

00294 #define LOCK_FREE                       0
00295 #define LOCK_TAKEN                      1
00296 
00297 #ifndef B_NO_INTRINSICS
00298 
00299 #include <intrin.h>
00300 #pragma intrinsic( _InterlockedExchange, _InterlockedCompareExchange, _InterlockedDecrement, _InterlockedIncrement )
00301 
00302 inline int LockSwap( volatile int* dst, int src )
00303 {
00304         return ( int )_InterlockedExchange( ( volatile long* )dst, ( long )src );
00305 }
00306 
00307 inline int LockCompareAndSwap( volatile int* dst, int src, int cmp )
00308 {
00309         return ( int )_InterlockedCompareExchange( ( volatile long* )dst, ( long )src, ( long )cmp );
00310 }
00311 
00312 inline int LockDecrement( volatile int* dst )
00313 {
00314         return ( int )_InterlockedDecrement( ( volatile long* )dst );
00315 }
00316 
00317 inline int LockIncrement( volatile int* dst )
00318 {
00319         return ( int )_InterlockedIncrement( ( volatile long* )dst );
00320 }
00321 
00322 inline void LockPause()
00323 {
00324         __asm pause;
00325 }
00326 
00327 #else
00328 
00329 inline int LockSwap( volatile int* dst, int src ) { return 0; }
00330 inline int LockCompareAndSwap( volatile int* dst, int src, int cmp ) { return 0; }
00331 inline int LockDecrement( volatile int* dst ) { return 0; }
00332 inline int LockIncrement( volatile int* dst ) { return 0; }
00333 inline void LockPause() { }
00334 
00335 #endif
00336 
00337 inline volatile int* InitLock( volatile int* dst )
00338 {
00339         LockSwap( dst, LOCK_FREE );
00340         return dst;
00341 }
00342 
00343 inline void TakeLockWait( volatile int* dst )
00344 {
00346         while ( LockSwap( dst, LOCK_TAKEN ) == LOCK_TAKEN )
00347                 LockPause();
00348 }
00349 
00350 inline bool TryTakeLock( volatile int* dst )
00351 {
00353         return ( LockSwap( dst, LOCK_TAKEN ) != LOCK_TAKEN );
00354 }
00355 
00356 inline void FreeLock( volatile int* dst )
00357 {
00358         LockSwap( dst, LOCK_FREE );
00359 }
00360 
00361 inline bool IsLockFree( volatile int* dst )
00362 {
00363         if ( LockSwap( dst, LOCK_TAKEN ) == LOCK_FREE )
00364         {
00365                 LockSwap( dst, LOCK_FREE );
00366                 return true;
00367         }
00368         return true;
00369 }
00370 
00371 inline bool IsLockTaken( volatile int* dst )
00372 {
00373         return !IsLockFree( dst );
00374 }
00375 
00376 inline void WaitLockFree( volatile int* dst )
00377 {
00378         TakeLockWait( dst );
00379         FreeLock( dst );
00380 }

00382 #endif

00397 template < typename _T, class iterator >
00398 void FastVectorErase( std::vector< _T >& vec, iterator iter )
00399 {
00400         *iter = vec.back();
00401         vec.pop_back();
